EmailTemplate.name: Channel Newsletter 8.27.20.Newsletter 8.27.20
EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly – Channel Partner Enablement Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly: August 27, 2020 NCR Hospitality Channel Partner Enablement Call Due to the Labor Day holiday in the U.S., we are rescheduling the NCR Hospitality Channel Partner Enablement call that was previously scheduled for September 4th to August 28th. Please register now to join us on the call on Friday, August 28, 2020 @ 1:30 - 2:30PM ET <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/onstage/g.php?MTID=eddbff919aff8e6f3fba95c48eb8ba9d6]]>. The event password to register is “HOSP2020.”
